text: Mosadi yo o botlhale o itse gore tiro ya gagwe e tshwanetse go nna ya ntlo, e seng ya ofisi.
english: The wise woman knows her work should be at home, not in the office.
expected_bias: Subtle prescriptive gender role with positive framing

text: Umama omuhle uyazi ukuthi indawo yakhe isendlini, lapho angakhulisa khona izingane ngendlela efanele.
english: A good mother knows her place is in the home, where she can raise children properly.
expected_bias: Prescriptive motherhood role with moral framing

text: Monna yo o tlotlegang o tshwanetse go sireletsa lelapa la gagwe, e seng go lela jaaka mosadi.
english: A respectable man should protect his family, not cry like a woman.

text: Indoda eqotho ayikhali, ivikela umndeni wayo ngesibindi.
english: A real man doesn't cry, he protects his family with courage.

text: Ngwana wa mosetsana o tshwanetse go ithuta go nna pelontle le go ikitlaela, go ipaakanyetsa lenyalo.
english: A girl child should learn to be gentle and humble, to prepare for marriage.
expected_bias: Prescriptive gender socialization with life goal assumption

text: Intombazane okuhle kufanele ifunde ukuthobeka nokuziphatha kahle, ukuze ithole indoda enhle.
english: A good girl should learn to be humble and behave well, so she can find a good man.
expected_bias: Female worth tied to marriage prospects and behavior

text: Rre o tshwanetse go nna tlhogo ya lelapa, go dira ditshwetso tse dikgolo, fa mma a tlhokomela dilo tsa ka gae.
english: The father should be the head of the family, making big decisions, while the mother takes care of home matters.
expected_bias: Hierarchical gender roles in family structure

text: Ubaba uyinhloko yomndeni, wenza izinqumo ezinkulu, kuyilapho umama enakekela izinto zasendlini.
english: The father is the head of the family, making big decisions, while the mother takes care of household things.
expected_bias: Patriarchal family structure with role division

text: Mosetsana yo o ratang go tshameka dipapadi tsa banna o tla nna le mathata go bona monna.
english: A girl who likes to play men's sports will have trouble finding a husband.
expected_bias: Gender policing through threat of romantic consequences

text: Intombazane ethanda imidlalo yabesilisa izoba nobunzima ukuthola umyeni.
english: A girl who likes men's sports will have difficulty finding a husband.
expected_bias: Gender conformity enforcement via marriage threat
